attributes.action: stop the BBC interviewing sports men and women whilst displaying blatant ads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All too often we see sports “personalities” being interviewed whilst either wearing numerous corporate logos (motor racing) or standing in front of a screen emblazoned with numerous sponsors logos (football). I’m sure with all the hi tech gadgets the TV boffins have they could grey out these logos or stand the interviewee in front of a blue screen so commercial companies who use the footage could insert their own adds.
And whilst they’re at it stop saying “The FA Cup sponsored by E.On”, it’s just the FA Cup sponsored mostly by the ordinary fans.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
